`PYTHON URL SHORTNER ¬© 2023`

## INSTALLING
```bash
pip install shortners
```

## SHORTNERS
```python

import asyncio
from shortners import Shortners

shortner_api = ""
shortner_url = ""
orginal_link = ""

core = Shortners(shortner_api, shortner_url)

async def test():
    o = await core.shortlink(orginal_link)
    print(f"RESULT : {o}")

asyncio.run(test())

```
